description: Developed and implemented front-end architecture of a full stack TPO web application using React.js.
Created technical documentation for system architecture, user flow, and troubleshooting guides.
Improved onboarding and reduced dev support load by 25%.
Maintained production UI features using React.
Optimised UI performance and improved reusability.
Worked with internal engineering teams to improve cloud tooling.
Built dashboards with internal APIs and Azure services.
